body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! This is Nicholas Bailey from Artistic Visions Gallery. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Nicholas, I'm having an issue with some data management for pieces I submitted online.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Theresa. Before we proceed, may I have your last name and the email associated with your account for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's Allen, and my email is theresa.allen@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Theresa. I've located your account. Now, could you please describe the specific issue you're experiencing with your data management?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, it seems like the latest artworks I uploaded haven't been correctly cataloged in my profile. They're missing from my publicly visible gallery.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand the issue now. Let me check the back-end data for your account. One moment, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Theresa. I've found the discrepancy and corrected it. Your artworks should now be properly displayed. Please check and confirm.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I just refreshed my page, and yes, I see them now! Thank you so much, Nicholas. I was really worried about this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Theresa! I'm glad I could help. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything. I appreciate your help today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It was my pleasure. Thank you for contacting Artistic Visions Gallery. Have a wonderful day, Theresa!
